1504870.name: Harpy Star
1504870.description:
Two monsters brave a land in conflict

A shut-in harpy named Radi has been asked to spend a day with her best friend Duri. Duri's big plans for today don't turn out as smoothly as she'd hoped, and these two best friends find themselves in the middle of a centuries-long conflict.

Harpy Star is a retro-inspired action game with a world begging to be explored. Everyone has an ability called Starpower, giving everyone a unique arcane power. Friends and foes alike will cross your path to pull you deeper into the war hidden beneath your talons, and you'll find yourself changing the world in grand ways!

Gameplay & Features

  • FLY! Use your wings to soar above enemies, and glide down to safety.
  • Play the game with friends for a crazy and fun flight through this game!
  • Learn recipes and cook dozens of tasty dishes. Each dish will bring you new powers, so choose wisely what you eat!
  • Play as Duri or Radi! Choose which harpy to play as, master their unique combat styles and Starpower abilities.
  • Deep lived-in environments teeming with life and natural beauty.
  • Countless unique people to meet, talk to, and get into petty arguments with.
  • Master your many ways to fly about the world, and find secrets far above the beaten path!
  • A plot of powerful artifacts is uncovered, Hiding knowledge of centuries old conflicts.
